Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Install two versions of the JRE on the OS: JRE 1.6.0_x and JRE 1.7.0_y
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Unfold the "Orchestra installation" category
Unfold the "COTS" sub-category
Unfold the "JavaJRE" sub-category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "JavaJRE" category contains three categories: "1.6.0.x", "1.7.0.y" and "Current". The "1.6.0.x" category (current version) is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.7.0.y" and select "Select as current version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.7.0.y" is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.7.0.y" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.6.0.x" and select "Set as current version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.6.0.x" is displayed with a larger font. The "1.7.0.y" is displayed with standard font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.6.0.x" category

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Restore parent version of a COTS

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Install two versions of the JRE on the OS: JRE 1.6.0_x and JRE 1.7.0_y
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create an administrator context called "InheritedAdminContext" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Unfold the "Orchestra installation" category
Unfold the "COTS" sub-category
Unfold the "JavaJRE" sub-category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "JavaJRE" category contains three categories: "1.6.0.x", "1.7.0.y" and "Current". The current version is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.7.0.y" and select "Select as current version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.7.0.x" is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "InheritedAdminContext" and select "Synchronize" in the contextual menu
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Unfold the "Orchestra installation" category
Unfold the "COTS" sub-category
Unfold the "JavaJRE" sub-category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "JavaJRE" category contains three categories: "1.6.0.x", "1.7.0.y" and "Current". The "1.7.0.y" category is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.6.0.x" and select "Select as current version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.6.0.x" is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.6.0.x" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.6.0.x" and select "Restore parent version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.7.0.y" is displayed with a larger font. The "1.6.0.x" is displayed with standard font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.7.0.y" category

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Initialise current version of all components at once

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Install two versions of the JRE on the OS: JRE 1.6.0_x and JRE 1.7.0_y
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Unfold the "Orchestra installation" category
Unfold the "COTS" sub-category
Unfold the "JavaJRE" sub-category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "JavaJRE" category contains three categories: "1.6.0.x", "1.7.0.y" and "Current". The "1.6.0.x" category (current version) is displayed with a larger font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on category "1.7.0.x" and select "Select as current version"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.7.0.x" is displayed with a larger font. The "1.6.0.y" is displayed with standard font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.7.0.y" category

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Right click on the "AdminContext" and select "Configure" -> "Initialize current versions" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "1.6.0.X" is displayed with a larger font. The "1.7.0.y" is displayed with standard font

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Current" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Variables "Executable" and "InstallLocation" do have identical values as in the "1.6.0.x" category
